attributes.action: ALLOW OUR NURSERY CHILDREN OUTDOOR PLAY
attributes.additional_details: Our local council, Barnet, has imposed a planning condition on our state of the art pre school nursery to forbid children access to ANY outdoor play in a safe, secure area because some local residents do not want to hear sounds of happy children playing.WE WANT THIS CONDITION REMOVED to allow children fresh air and exercise, twice a day, in small supervised groups.  Our children range from 9 months to 4 years.  PLEASE GIVE YOUR SUPPORT!
